lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Abnormally hot, dry weather in midwestern crop areas sparked a sharp rally in Chicago futures today, causing new crop soybeans to advance the 30 cent daily limit to 6.14 dlrs per bushel and September corn to go up 12 cents to 2.81 dlrs.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The USDA meteorologist said the only effects of the warm, dy weather on crops so far has probably been to speed up development of the crop, which will help the crop better cope with stress later in its more critical growing period.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: But because of its early development this year, Strommen said the midwestern corn crop could enter its reproduction period by the first of July.
